class.name: EPASInertializationNode
class.brief_description: Node for using the [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BYyv4KTegJI]inertialization[/url] pose transition technique.
class.description: To use, do whatever changes you need to the tree and then call [method inertialize].

method.name: inertialize
method.description: Queues an inertialization transition, this should be called after the animation tree has been changed to reflect the new target pose. If [param bone_filter] is not empty the inertialization routine will only affect the bones contained within it. [b]Note:[/b] The [param transition_duration] may be lowered to prevent overshoot (and may vary between bones), it will however never be higher than the input.
